document_title: Meningococcal meningitis: Signs, causes, diagnosis, treatment
subsection_content:
Meningococcal disease in children is a disease that progresses quickly, so the disease needs to be treated quickly. First, the doctor will inject antibiotics into the patient's veins to inhibit the growth of bacteria. After that, your doctor may prescribe oral medication once the disease is under control.
In some cases, the disease becomes serious, causing severe shock and complications have begun to appear. The doctor will treat based on the complications that have appeared such as: respiratory and circulatory support, balance electrolytes, cardiovascular support,...
>>>See more: Can meningitis be cured?
